name: C. Strange Birthday Party
statement:
Petya organized a strange birthday party. He invited n friends and
assigned an integer k_i to the i-th of them. Now Petya would like to
give a present to each of them. In the nearby shop there are m unique
presents available, the j-th present costs c_j dollars (1
le c_1
le c_2
le
ldots
le c_m). It’s allowed to buy a single present more than once.For the
i-th friend Petya can either buy them a present j
le k_i, which costs c_j dollars, or just give them c_{k_i} dollars
directly.Help Petya determine the minimum total cost of hosting his
party.
